modName: Navetsea Body Textures BAIN and NMM Installer
summary: Version 1.9 of Navetsea's "CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible" packaged with a BAIN wizard and a NMM install script
descriptionHtml:
This is simply a repackage of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6554]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url] v1.9 in a BAIN-friendly format with a BAIN and NMM install wizard.

The installation describes 3 maps as "Smooth", "Fit" and "Toned". This is my subjective interpretation of the maps; navetsea might have meant for them to be "Young", "Aged" and "Old" maps, and I mistook the chiseling for a tone body. So look at the pictures when selecting the options.

For a really Toned body, I suggest installing the Smooth version and applying [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16731]Fitness Body[/url] Texture Blender.

[b]Installation[/b]
Download the file through the manager
Activate the file
Follow the instructions

[b]Uninstallation[/b]
Simply uninstall via Wrye Bash or NMM, there is no ESP or anything involved, simply replacer textures.

Credits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/496662]navetsea[/url] for all the textures from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6554]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url]
author: Tase
